Player 1 bids $440 for the property.
Player 2 passes on the property.
Player 3 bids $460 for the property.
Player 1 bids $480 for the property.
Player 3 bids $500 for the property.
Player 1 bids $520 for the property.
Player 3 bids $540 for the property.
Player 1 bids $560 for the property.
Player 3 bids $580 for the property.
Player 1 bids $600 for the property.
Player 3 bids $620 for the property.
Player 1 passes on the property.
